snippet.title: CACTUS | Gamescom 2024 Trailer
snippet.description:
🌠 PLAY THE DEMO: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2067890/CACTUS
👉 News & Devlogs: https://steamcommunity.com/app/2067890
🗣️ Join Discord: https://discord.gg/C6TPe8pyR2

💬 FOLLOW US
---------------------------------------------------
https://twitter.com/AxonFluxStudio
https://www.instagram.com/axonflux
https://www.threads.net/@axonflux
https://www.tiktok.com/@axonflux
https://www.facebook.com/axonfluxstudio

🌵 CACTUS
---------------------------------------------------
Unleash your prickly prowess in this single player FPS! Embark on an extraordinary journey, where you assume the role of a spiky hero navigating through meticulously crafted stages.

With a blend of classic FPS elements and quirky new ideas. Master foes, evade traps, discover artifacts, and even confront the blazing sun in a unique indie gaming experience!
